metadata.description: Studio 407 gives you a TASTE OF TERROR collecting the first issues of our three most terrifying horror comics, HYBRID, NIGHT & FOG, and SMUGGLING SPIRITS. Explore the mysteries of the watery deep in the bloody creature feature HYBRID. Then run for your life from evolution's most perfect killer in the mutant survival horror NIGHT & FOG. Finally experience a alternate history where ruthless monsters run rampant through prohibition-era America in the thrilling SMUGGLING SPIRITS. Grab all three first issues with over 110 pages of story for only $4.99. It's a deal so good its scary!
metadata.name: Taste of Terror
